example_sentence_italian: Il libro è su quel tavolo.
example_sentence_english: The book is on that table.

translation_english: on the (masculine singular; before most consonants)
example_sentence_english: The cat is on the table.

translation_english: on the (masculine singular; before s+consonant, z, gn, ps, x, y)
notes: contraction of su + lo; before s+consonant, z, gn, ps, x
example_sentence_english: The backpack is on the shelf.
The book is on the chair.

notes: contraction of su + l'; used before vowels
example_sentence_english: The bird is on the tree.

translation_english: on the (masculine plural; before most consonants)
example_sentence_english: There are books on the tables.

translation_english: on the (masculine plural; before vowel or s+consonant, z, gn, ps, x, y)
notes: contraction of su + gli; before s+consonant, z, gn, ps, x
example_sentence_english: The glasses are on the shelves.
I put the cups on the shelves.
